answers.author: Jeffrey Naftal
answers.text:
Here are our top 10 for the last month.  This holds true for the most part except for when we have special items that get people's attention:
Section                               Page Views    Percent of Total
Default Home Page   4963    20.24%
Calendar of Events  3721    15.18%
Breaking News                    1185   4.83%
Community Events    830     3.39%
Police                                    691   2.82%
Search Results                   621    2.53%
Dormont News                     499    2.04%
FAQ                                       460   1.88%
Contact Listings                     447    1.82%
Council Meetings - 
Minutes and Agendas     436     1.78%

answers.text:
Hi Mark, 
Here is a document that covers local government web pages in general which you may find helpful in your research. This is ICMA's 2011 E-government Survey Summary (icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/302947). 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org

answers.author: Toby Cotter
answers.text:
After the default page, jobs is always our number one viewed page. The calendar of events and news are also popular. I can provide a complete breakdown and analysis if needed.


After the default page, jobs is always our number one viewed page. The calendar of events and news are also popular. I can provide a complete breakdown and analysis if needed.

answers.author: Richard Hoon
answers.text:
Eustis, FL is similar to what Toby submitted....default (home), then employment, events, press releases and then utility billing payment.

author: Mark Abeles-Allison
text: What web pages on your communities site gets the most hits?
title: WEB SITE POPULARITY
